entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Missing 'unnecessary assignment of a value' diagnostic #59525

Closed

  • IntelliSense is not suggesting generate method option #59251
  • Quick Actions and Refactorings: "Add parameter to constructor" in partial class replaces current file content with the file containing the constructor #59292
    17.2
  • Compiler doesn't show warning about not exhaustive switch expression #59511
  • ID0056 bad suggestion in netstandard2.0 #59514

PullRequests

Created

  • Catch more exceptions #59526
    Area-IDE
  • Fix nullable warning on conversion of anonymous function with implicit parameters #59522
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Fix "Add Constructor Parameter From Members" for partial classes #59450
    Area-IDE, Next
  • IDE0056, IDE0057: Move language version check to compilation start, minor cleanup #59523
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #59521
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/vs2022-theme #59520
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #59519
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #59518
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Simplify the wrapping code for initializer-expression wrapping #59397
    Area-IDE
  • Make solution options global #59168
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Add more tests (GetMembers, speculative semantic model) #59270
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [draft] VS 2022 new dark theme editor colors #58855
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
